title: Get Help from Healer Nettie
content:
d another way to cure ourselves. Nettie's dead - serves her right for trying to poison us. But it's a bittersweet victory: we still need to find a way to deal with the parasite. We left the area without seeing if the druid apprentice could heal us.

Get Help from Healer Nettie Walkthrough

Get Help from Healer Nettie is a subquest for Find a Cure.

At the Sacred Pool in Emerald Grove, there is a Stone Door (X:224 Y:527) that you will have to go through. Head to the Druid's Chambers and speak to
